metadata.subject: Letter of Recommendation for Michael Bocci

relationships.description: Employer-employee relationship with Trump serving as mentor to Bocci

analysis.purpose: To provide a strong letter of recommendation for Michael Bocci's employment or business partnership opportunities
analysis.significance: Shows Donald Trump's direct endorsement and high regard for an employee's capabilities across legal and business domains

notable_quotes: Michael was a person that I would call into my office and could always count on for a smart point of view.
He has prospered under my mentorship and I relied on him as an asset to every area of my business.
He will make any company or individual that may be lucky enough to work alongside him more effective, efficient and profitable.

blackmail_indicators.description: Standard professional letter of recommendation with no indicators of coercion or blackmail

illegal_activity.description: Standard professional correspondence with no illegal activity mentioned or implied

public_knowledge.context: Standard business correspondence that would be typical for employment verification purposes

analysis.summary: Donald Trump provides a strong letter of recommendation for Michael Bocci, praising his three years of service as Managing Director of Business Development and Special Counsel at The Trump Organization, highlighting his legal and business acumen and recommending him for employment or partnership opportunities.
